snippet: Even if a court grants Hostess Brands' motion to liquidate, there is a good chance it will include the sale of Hostess's intellectual property, including trademarks like Twinkie.
abstract: Even if a court grants Hostess Brands' motion to liquidate, there is a good chance it will include the sale of Hostess's intellectual property, including trademarks like Twinkie.

headline.main: Twinkies' Shelf Life May Last a Little Longer
